title: Today proved that the Queen’s Speech was a ridiculous waste of Her Majesty’s time
text:
Remember the Queen’s Speech? You know. The thing that was so blisteringly essential that the Government unlawfully suspended Parliament so that it could take place. Only for the Government to abandon the debate on it so that it could hold a debate on the Brexit bill instead. Only for the Government to abandon that debate too because a vote on the timetable didn’t go its way.

Yes, that Queen’s Speech. Well, after the debate that caused the debate to be abandoned was abandoned, the debate was finally able to resume. Not that there was much point in resuming it, because if, as Boris Johnson wants, we’re about to have a general election, then straight afterwards there will have to be a whole new...
